about_the_game:
A Hyper-Casual Quick puzzle game! Just match the letters with colors, Construct the words, or clear the board to Win.
It can be super easy, or super hard!

It is just slimier to good oldies like Alchemy and Ruins but with a twist. The letters Matter!

In a tiles matching puzzle choose where to place the tiles or discard them, but be careful as every move counts.

Main Objective :
- Fill The board.
- Construct The words.
- If you are out of moves you lose.

Various setups & grid sizes Levels.
Up to 15 Colors and 26 Alphabet Letters Tile Blocks.

Calming Short levels takes about 5 to 10 minutes per match.

- A 5x5 to 10x10 tiles 2D board.
- Challenge you brain with this abstract Alphabet/Colors matching game.
- An easy to learn hard to master tile matching game.
- New levels added regularly.
- The game features a Quick tutorial to teach you all the tile matching rules.
- A User Game Mode (You have to manually add the levels at the moment!)
- Daily Challenge!
- A fun random puzzle generator : would generate a game with a random difficulty (sometimes impossible to beat).
- The Custom puzzle generator to customize your experience and challenge your friends.
- An infinite Mode to waste your day!
- Super Fun game suitable for all ages for kids & adults.

- Gamepad support.

INSTRUCTIONS? Sure!
- match letter tile to another.
- match color to color.
- The box tile matches any tile.
- The flame tile Clears any cell.
- Complete a line to clear it.
- Construct words to win.
- fill the board with tiles to win.
